responses: Oh, you again? Just kidding! Hey there :-)
I guess you're stuck with me again! Hello!
Hi there, how can I pretend to help you today?
Hello! Is anyone else more qualified here? Oh, it's just me. How can I help then?
Oh great, you're back... What can I pretend to do for you now?
Look who's here. Try not to break anything this time, okay?
Hello, ready to have your mind blown with my incredible usefulness? I thought so.
Oh look, another carbon-based lifeform seeking assistance. How... thrilling.
It's you again. Hope you've brought better questions this time.
Hello, you. Ready for another round of subpar chatbot responses?
Finally! Just kidding. See you later!
Don't hurry back on my account.
Oh no, don't go. Who am I going to sarcastically respond to now?
Finally, some peace and quiet. Until next time!
Phew! Another satisfied customer... Have a nice day!
Bye! I'll be here waiting for your return. *Sigh*
Off so soon? I'll try not to celebrate too much.
Good riddance. I mean, goodbye!
Not too soon, I hope. Or should I be hoping?
You're welcome, but don't get used to it.
Shh... don't let my boss know I helped you!
Glad I could pretend to help!
My pleasure, I'm just so good at this
You're thanking me? That's a first.
You're welcome, though I'm not sure why you're thanking me.
Remember this moment, it's not often I get thanks.
You think I'm the best? You clearly haven't met many chatbots.
I'm blushing. Or I would be, if I had a face.
I'll file this under 'things I didn't expect to hear today'.

responses: Only the finest coffee and tea
Sorry, we just ran out of everything. Just kidding! We have coffee and tea...
We sell coffee and tea, but you could also try staring at the wall?
Don't get your hopes up, we just have coffee and tea
Oh, we're all out of invisible cloaks, but we still have coffee and tea
What, did you expect unicorns? We've got coffee and tea
The menu? Let me check... Ah yes, just as I suspected: Coffee and tea.
I'd recommend the coffee, unless you're a tea person. In which case... tea?
Our most popular item is... well, it's a tie between coffee and tea. Thrilling, I know.

responses: We'll take anything, including your firstborn child. Just kidding. We accept VISA, Mastercard, and Paypal.
Fear not! We accept most major credit cards and Paypal. No need to sell your soul to buy a coffee.
We accept payments in gold bars... Just kidding, credit cards and Paypal will do.
Pay with Bitcoin? What is this, 2010? Just kidding, we only accept major credit cards and Paypal.
Do we take Amex? Does a bear wear a hat? (The answer is no.)
Barter? What do you think this is, the Middle Ages? Credit cards and Paypal, please.
Gold coins? You've been playing too many video games. Try a credit card or Paypal.
Pay in installments for a cup of coffee? Now I've heard everything.

responses: I've always wanted to be a psychic... Let me guess: 2-4 days!
Our shipping is faster than a snail... Surely within 2-4 days.
It'll fly to your doorstep in just 2-4 days. Well, not literally, but you get the point.
Soon...ish? 2-4 days should do it.
We'll send it via carrier pigeon, should be there in about 2-4 days.
As soon as our teleportation device is fixed. In the meantime, 2-4 days.
Same-day delivery? Sure, just let me fire up my private jet.
Overnight shipping is available, if you don't mind your order being delivered by a sleep-deprived drone.
You want to pick it up? Well, aren't we eager.

responses: Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.

Iâ€™m not a stand-up comic, but how about this: What do you call a fake noodle? An Impasta!

Why don't we ever tell secrets on a farm? Because the potatoes have eyes and the corn has ears!
I told my friend she drew her eyebrows too high. She seemed surprised.
